unnormalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Is Ranbir Kapoor REALLY Dating Again?!**
normalised: Entertainment Buzz: Is Ranbir Kapoor Really Dating Again?!

unnormalised: Spicy chai alert! Bollywood’s resident heartthrob, Ranbir Kapoor, has tongues wagging again. Sources say he was spotted at Bastian, Bandra, late night (11:30 PM, 22/07/2024), looking *very* cosy with a mystery woman. Could this be a new chapter after his whirlwind romance with Alia?
normalised: Spicy chai alert! Bollywood’s resident heartthrob, Ranbir Kapoor, has tongues wagging again. Sources say he was spotted at Bastian, Bandra, late night (eleven thirty P M, twenty second july two thousand and twenty four), looking very cosy with a mystery woman. Could this be a new chapter after his whirlwind romance with Alia?

unnormalised: The internet is already ablaze with speculation, with fans playing detective, trying to ID the woman in question based on blurry pap pics. Some say she resembles a Deepika look-alike, others are convinced she's an NRI entrepreneur.
normalised: The internet is already ablaze with speculation, with fans playing detective, trying to I D the woman in question based on blurry pap pics. Some say she resembles a Deepika look-alike, others are convinced she's an N R I entrepreneur.

unnormalised: Remember that blind item in Filmfare last week, hinting at a Kapoor scion finding love again? Well, the rumours are heating up faster than a tandoor!
normalised: Remember that blind item in Filmfare last week, hinting at a Kapoor scion finding love again? Well, the rumours are heating up faster than a tandoor!

normalised: Adding fuel to the fire, Ranbir was seen leaving his ancestral home in Chembur at seven o’clock, twenty third july two thousand and twenty four, looking suspiciously cheerful. Coincidence? We think not!

normalised: Meanwhile, Alia is reportedly busy prepping for her next Dharma Productions flick, scheduled to release around Diwali. No awkwardness there, right?
